name: Xerath
title: the Magus Ascendant
lore: Powerful beyond reckoning, the Ascended being known as Xerath was once a mortal of flesh and blood. He is now something vastly different - a being of writhing arcane energy. Having emerged from millennia-spanning imprisonment, he is now ready to unleash his power upon Runeterra, and utterly destroy any who oppose him.
blurb: Powerful beyond reckoning, the Ascended being known as Xerath was once a mortal of flesh and blood. He is now something vastly different - a being of writhing arcane energy. Having emerged from millennia-spanning imprisonment, he is now ready to ...
allytips_0: It's easier to land Arcanopulse on an enemy when they're moving toward or away from you, rather than side to side.
allytips_1: Eye of Destruction will make landing Arcanopulse easier as the target will be slowed.
allytips_2: If you stun an enemy with Shocking Orb, follow up with a guaranteed center hit on Eye of Destruction.
enemytips_0: Xerath's range can be intimidating, but most champions who close distance with him can trade favorably.
enemytips_1: Xerath takes a long time to engage Rite of the Arcane. Watch for his spellcast animation and start dodging.
enemytips_2: Banshee's Veil will make it much harder for Xerath to land Shocking Orb on you.
